projectGridLines.title: Intern-Financial Analyst
projectGridLines.description:
This role will be anchored around Business KPIs management, interfacing with Founders, Team Heads & Finance team. The role is expected to work as part of Founder's office and serve as central intelligence for leadership team to take data-backed initiatives timely..


Skill Sets

  1. Excel modelling is a must.
  2. Written communication (emails & excel).
  3. Knowledge of Tableau, PowerBI is a bonus plus.


Traits expectation:

  • Strives for perfection in output.
  • Attention to detail & love for numbers.
  • Able to develop data-backed point of view.


Expected learning:

  • The candidate will learn to get first-hand experience on how to scale a business in the 1 to 10 journey. Learning will be steep on getting business insights from data, MIS management and soft-skills essential to corporate.


Specific courses required for project execution:

  • Intermediate to advanced level Excel is a must

projectGridLines.title: Intern - Engineering
projectGridLines.description:
Rumble B2B2C Gaming Portal 

  • Skill sets: Java, Reactjs, Nextjs, Nodejs 

Traits expectation: 

  • Self-starter, attitude to work in a face paced environment. 

Expected learning: 

  • Will learn end to end development of scalable B2B2C platform, OOPS, SOLID principles, design patterns, architecture, and system design. 

Specific courses required for project execution: 

  • Computer Programming I & II, Data Structures and Algorithms(if applicable)

projectGridLines.title: Intern – Product Management
projectGridLines.description:
Title:

Intern – Product Management

Description:

1. Managing different aspects of a product in it’s lifecycle – user research, product ideation,

conceptualization, feature research and requirement definition, UI/ UX, analytics etc.

2. Work closely with the business, marketing, engineering and Design teams to think of

product features (that align with the KPIs) and build a pipeline of features for user

engagement and retention

3. Building Data dashboards with SQL and python scripting for automating workflows

4. Using data to program and power the content platform with the best and most relevant

content possible

Skill sets:

Strong analytical skills, Familiarity with Data and Design tools like Google Analytics, Figma is a

plus (not mandatory)

Traits expectation:

Attention to detail, Self-starter, attitude to work in a face paced environment, Inclination

towards product management.

Expected learning:

1. Exposure to how content-first B2B2C products are built, managed and scaled in the

media, entertainment and gaming space.

2. Learning how to perform user research, identifying user pain points, product ideation and

collaboration with Design, Engineering, Marketing, Operations, Sales, Customer Success

and Data teams to drive impact.

Specific courses required for project execution:

Proficiency using SQL, Python
